website_summaries.verdict: You’ll love the OLED display screen that delivers HD quality when viewing video. This is one of LG’s top phone models, and it’s made for the busy user.
pros: Excellent camera technology gives selfies depth and quality
Includes hands-free 3D face recognition to unlock the phone
cons: Price is higher than that of other LG smartphones
Sometimes it can be difficult to find a compatible case for this model

customer_reviews.title: A true steal for its specs
customer_reviews.text: So much specs for such a great price. Camera takes great pictures, screen is vivid and sharp, and the phone itself is quick. I know many will argue that LG's software isn't always great, but this phone has shown no issues. Software is smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Wally

customer_reviews.title: Software problems
customer_reviews.text: Had problems with the phone actually getting phone calls. I would get told later oh I called you 8 times but the phone never showed 1 unless they left a voicemail.
customer_reviews.author: Carrissa

customer_reviews.title: LG G8s cell phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone came when it was suppose to and i tried transferring my info from my old apple5c phone but i`m not teck savy enough to do that. I will take the time to enter all the necessary info into the new phone manually, as i do not have a whole lot of stuff to transfer anyway. Overall so far i am satisified wit the phone.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when ordering a case for this phone. Might get the wrong one for this model.
customer_reviews.author: kaus edwin

customer_reviews.title: a great phone
customer_reviews.text: It is compatible using in asia, and the CPU is owesome, very fast response. The display is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Kin Lo

customer_reviews.title: Phone is great.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Brand new phone. No scratches. Added Standard US adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good cellphone
customer_reviews.text: I had no problem with this flagship .. its good cellphone for low price :)
customer_reviews.author: Franz

customer_reviews.title: Could not get this phone to work reliably.
customer_reviews.text: I can not get this phone to work reliably. I am the midwest of the USA. I had someone try to find new firmware that we could work in the usa better. He couldn't find it. Also tried some other stuff and wont take phone calls in any buildings. Also connects to the internet at home but not at either of my places of employment I had to go back to using my old phone.
customer_reviews.author: Karol Lynn Baker

customer_reviews.title: THIS PHONE DOES NOT SUPPORT 4G
customer_reviews.text: This phone does not support LTE/4G It says in the product description that it does but it does not. 3G on this phone is waaaay slower as well. Super bad scam dont buy
customer_reviews.author: Nami Wringold

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware of inferior product
customer_reviews.text: The worst phone I have ever owned. Touted as having THE best camera - no better than the latest Samsung. When I play videos on social media, either the picture goes black or the audio stops working. The settings seem to have a mind of their own. I miss calls and sometimes folks say they called me but I never call back because not only does the ring go out intermittently but calls aren't showing up. This phone will slide if it is on an even floor. I just got this pos in April. I have to put up with this junk for 2 .5 more years. Stick with Samsung - it is superior in every way.
customer_reviews.author: C. Thomas

product_meta.title: LG G8s ThinQ (128GB, 6GB RAM) 6.21" OLED Display, Snapdragon 855, Single SIM GSM Factory Unlocked LM-G810EA - US + Global 4G LTE International Model (Mirror Black (Single SIM))
product_meta.description: Color:BlackAlluring Glass DesignDesigned with depth. The 2.5D glass brings a richer, more colourful finish to the back, and the distinct side metal creates a well balanced feel. Rounded and refined details deliver the optimal ergonomic grip. Real Depth Sensing CameraFor more than photos. The Z Camera uses infrared light and ToF sensor technology to bring stronger biometric security. It even enables a touch-free phone interface, and adds extraordinary depth and resolution to selfies. Unlock How You WantSecurity as you like it. Added to fingerprint recognition, are 3D face recognition and superior hand vein recognition. Choose what feels right, from three types of biorecognition for next-level security and convenience. Give Touchless CommandsDiscover a new way to interact with your screen that frees up your hand. Hands dirty or wet? With a simple gesture, easily access favorite functions, answer calls, and even increase volume without touching your phone. Blow Your Mind with SoundGive your ears a show. Real stereo sound jumps from the top and bottom speakers with clear two-channel separation. DTS:X 3D audio and Meridian Sound Tuning widen the sound field to echo all the emotion of listening live. Blazing Speeds, Legendary PowerUshering in a new decade of transformative user experiences. Unleash the ultimate mobile platform, Qualcomm Snapdragon 855, for multi-gigabit connectivity, smarter AI, real-time XR, ultra-responsive multi-player gaming with Snapdragon Elite Gaming, 4K HDR video, longer battery life, and more.
feature_bullets: Display - 6.21 inches, FHD+ G-OLED (2248x1080),18.7:9 Aspect Ratio, 401PPI, Qualcomm Snapdragon 855/2.84GHz Quad + 1.7GHz Quad, Android 9 Pie
128GB ROM, 6GB RAM, microSD, up to 1 TB (dedicated slot), Single SIM (Nano-SIM), 3550mAh Battery
Triple rear camera - 12MP, 13MP, 12MP, Dual front Camera - 8MP, ToF (224px X 172px), Bluetooth 5.0 BLE, Fingerprint (rear-mounted)

International model phone, Does not have US warranty. Factory Unlocked cellphones are compatible with most of the GSM carriers such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but are not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint.
